question: ‘Code of Practice on Disinformation and Misinformation’, which was making news recently, is associated with which country?
explanation:
Australia introduced the Code of Practice on Disinformation and Misinformation to address the spread of fake news and disinformation on online platforms.
Top technology tech giants like Facebook, Google, Microsoft, TikTok and Twitter have agreed on adopt the code on misinformation. It was prepared by the Digital Industry Group Inc (DiGi), a non-profit industry association.
